#id = 387 - country = FRA - The French Alliance

#id = 999448 - country = U01 - SOE Agents parachuted in France
#id = 1000109 - country = FRA - Reorganization of the Bank of France;
#id = 9300213 - country = FRA - Franc Devaluation;
#id = 9001 - country = FRA - Motorways for the People
#id = 9014 - country = FRA - Knights of the New Age
#id = 9015 - country = FRA - Charlemagne armored division
#id = 9016 - country = FRA - Charlemagne armored division formed
#id = 9030 - country = FRA - Voiture du Peuple
#id = 9031 - country = FRA - VdP factories are ready
#id = 9032 - country = FRA - VdP factories are ready
#id = 9033 - country = FRA - VdP Research and Development Bureau
#id = 758435 - country = FRA - Payment of the Compiegne Armistice reparations" # Payment of the Brest-Litovsk repration
#id = 758436 - country = GER - Payment of the Compiegne Armistice reparations" # Payment of the Brest-Litovsk repration

event = {
	id = 350
	country = FRA
	random = no
	style = 2
	picture = "Petain"

	date = { day = 25 month = january year = 1948 }

	name = "WW2 Outcome - Armistice at Compiegne"
	desc = "After the fall of France in 1940, we were forced to sign the humilating Armistice at Compi√®gne. While it was never meant to be a permanent peace treaty, the armistice is still being forced upon us. It limits our army, and forces us to make concessions in every way imaginable."

	action = {
		name = "We are humiliated"

		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = -10 } 
		command = { type = trade which = GER where = FRA supplies = 100 money = 150 when = 1500 value = 1 } 
		
		command = { type = access which = AXI }	# Axis Use of Vichy Bases	
		command = { type = access which = GER }	# German Use of Vichy Bases	
		command = { type = access which = ITA }	# Italian Use of Vichy Bases
		
		command = { type = deactivate_unit_type which = motorized } 
		command = { type = deactivate_unit_type which = mechanized } 
		command = { type = deactivate_unit_type which = light_armor } 
		
		command = { type = dissent value = 15 }
	}
}

# 351 - Death of Petain - 1948 or 1949 or 1950
event = {
	id = 351
	random = no
	save_date = yes
	country = FRA	
	style = 2
	picture = "french_flag"
	
	name = "Petain has died" 
	desc = "351DESC"
	
	date = { day = 1 month = october year = 1948 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1955 }
	
	trigger = { 
		OR = { 
			random = 5 
			AND = { 
				random = 10 
				year = 1949 
			} 
			year = 1950 
		}
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "Admiral Darlan, militar government"
			ai_chance = 25
						
			command = { type = relation which = GER value = 10 }

			#New Government
			command = { type = headofstate which = 5394 }
			command = { type = headofgovernment which = 5189 }
			command = { type = foreignminister which = 5397 }
			command = { type = armamentminister which = 5398 }
			command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 5215 }
			command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 5226 }
			command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 5399 }
			command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 5136 }
			command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 5009 }
			command = { type = chiefofair which = 5196 }		
			
			#Sleep Ministers
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5188 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5237 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5239 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5254 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5258 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5275 }
		    command = { type = sleepminister which = 5293 }
			command = { type = sleepleader which = 5237 }
	        command = { type = sleepleader which = 78 }
			
			command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
			command = { type = setflag which = DarlanVichy } 
			
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "Pierre Laval and a conservative government" 
			ai_chance = 25
						
			command = { type = relation which = GER value = 20 }
			
			#New Government
			command = { type = headofstate which = 5393 }
			command = { type = headofgovernment which = 5197 }
			command = { type = foreignminister which = 5201 }
			command = { type = armamentminister which = 5400 }
			command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 5192 }
			command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 5193 }
			command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 5363 }
			command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 5221 }
			command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 5009 }
			command = { type = chiefofair which = 5196 }	
			
			#Sleep Ministers
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5188 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5237 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5239 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5254 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5258 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5275 }
		    command = { type = sleepminister which = 5293 }
			command = { type = sleepleader which = 5237 }
	        command = { type = sleepleader which = 78 }
			
			command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
			command = { type = setflag which = LavalVichy } 
			
			command = { type = set_domestic which = interventionism value = 3 } #isolationist
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "Ultra-Collaborationist take over, supported by Germany" 
			ai_chance = 25
			
			command = { type = relation which = GER value = 200 }
			
			#New Government
			command = { type = headofstate which = 5395 }
			command = { type = headofgovernment which = 5404 }
			command = { type = foreignminister which = 5403 }
			command = { type = armamentminister which = 5400 }
			command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 5402 }
			command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 5401 }
			command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 5362 }
			command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 5371 }
			command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 5377 }
			command = { type = chiefofair which = 5196 }
			
			#Sleep Ministers				
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5188 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5237 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5239 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5254 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5258 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5275 }
		    command = { type = sleepminister which = 5293 }
			command = { type = sleepleader which = 5237 }
	        command = { type = sleepleader which = 78 }
			
			command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 1 } #dictatorship
		    command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 1 } #nationalsocialist
			
			command = { type = dissent value = 15 }
			command = { type = setflag which = UltraVichy } 
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "Henri Rol-Tanguy and an independent civil government"
			ai_chance = 25
			
			command = { type = end_non_aggression which = FRA where = GER } 
			command = { type = relation which = GER value = -200 }
			
			#New Government			
			command = { type = headofstate which = 5396 }
			command = { type = headofgovernment which = 5284 }

			#Sleep Ministers			
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5188 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5237 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5239 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5254 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5258 }
			command = { type = sleepminister which = 5275 }
		    command = { type = sleepminister which = 5293 }
			command = { type = sleepleader which = 5237 }
	        command = { type = sleepleader which = 78 }
			
			command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 7 }
		    command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 8 }
			
			command = { type = dissent value = -10 }
			command = { type = setflag which = FreeVichy } 
	}
}

# 352 - Chaos in France 1948 or 1949 or 1950 (chain only with flag = UltraVichy)
event = {
	id = 352
	random = no
	country = FRA	
	style = 2
	picture = "ProtestAlexanderetta"
	
	name = "Chaos in France" #Chaos in France
    desc = "The very fact that France is now being controlled by Pro-German forces has not gone unnoticed by the French citizens. Over the last few weeks, riots have been emerging all over the country and the French resistance is stronger than ever before. We have to act"
	
	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 14
	deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1955 }
	
	trigger = { 
		flag = UltraVichy #Ultra-Collaborationist
	}

	action = {
			name = "Send a request to Berlin"
			ai_chance = 60
			command = { type = dissent value = 30 }
		    command = { type = trigger which = 353 }
			command = { type =	removecore which = 49 }
			command = { type =	removecore which = 50 }
			command = { type =	removecore which = 51 }			
			command = { type =	removecore which = 52 }			
			command = { type =	removecore which = 96 }			
			command = { type =	removecore which = 101 }
			command = { type =	removecore which = 102 }
			command = { type =	removecore which = 103 }
			command = { type =	removecore which = 105 }			
			command = { type =	removecore which = 106 }	
			
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "We will put down the protests ourself" 
			ai_chance = 40
			command = { type = dissent value = 15 }
	}
}

# 353 - Intervene in France?  - GER
event = {
	id = 353
	random = no
	country = GER	
	style = 2
	picture = "Reichstag"
	
	name = "Intervene in France" #Intervene in France?
    desc = "Pro-German factions in the French state have come under heavy pressure from their own citizens. They have requested our support, but it will require a very big effort from us to establish stable control in France, while Germany itself has enough other priorities."
	
	action = {
			name = "The Wehrmacht take control of Paris"
			ai_chance = 70
			
			command = { type = end_non_aggression which = FRA where = GER } 
			command = { type = make_puppet which = FRA }
			
			command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
			command = { type = manpowerpool value = -10 }
			command = { type = supplies value = -1000 } 	       
			
		    command = { type = sleepevent which = 354 } #The Government falls			
			command = { type = trigger which = 361 }  
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "Let the French sort out" 
			ai_chance = 30
			command = { type = end_non_aggression which = FRA where = GER } 
	        command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -50 }
	}
	
}

#The Government Falls! 
event = {
	id = 354
	random = no
	country = FRA
	one_action = yes
	style = 2
	picture = "ProtestAlexanderetta"

	trigger = {
		flag = UltraVichy	
		random = 10
	}
	
	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 70
	deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1955 }

	name = "The Ultra-Collaborationist Government fall"
    desc = "The Pro-Axis government has been toppled by the French citizens themself! They now have either the power to allow Darlan and the army to return, or establishing a true civilian government."
	
	action = {
			name = "Admiral Darlan will return the France to the glory" #Admiral Darlan
			ai_chance = 50
			command = { type = end_non_aggression which = FRA where = GER } 
			command = { type = relation which = GER value = -50 }
			
			command = { type = name where = FRA which = "France" }
			
			command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 4 }
		    command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
			
			command = { type = clrflag which = UltraVichy } 
			command = { type = setflag which = DarlanVichy } 
			
			command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
			
			command = { type = headofstate which = 5394 }
			command = { type = headofgovernment which = 5189 }
			command = { type = foreignminister which = 5397 }
			command = { type = armamentminister which = 5398 }
			command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 5215 }
			command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 5226 }
			command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 5399 }
			command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 5136 }
			command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 5009 }
			command = { type = chiefofair which = 5196 }		
			
			command = { type = add_corps which = "1st Paris Army" value = land where = 55 }
			command = { type = add_division which = "1st Rifle Division" value = infantry when = 10 }
			command = { type = add_division which = "2nd Rifle Division" value = infantry when = 10 }
			
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "Revolution ! A new French Republic is proclaimed" #A new French Revolution - A new Republic!
			ai_chance = 40
			command = { type = end_non_aggression which = FRA where = GER } 
			command = { type = relation which = GER value = -150 }
			
			command = { type = name where = FRA which = "France Republic" }
			
			command = { type = clrflag which = UltraVichy } 
			command = { type = setflag which = FreeVichy } 
			
			command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 7 }
		    command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 8 }
			
			command = { type = dissent value = -10 }
			
			command = { type = headofstate which = 5396 } #Henri Rol-Tanguy
			command = { type = headofgovernment which = 5284 }			
			
			command = { type = add_corps which = "1st Garcon Army" value = land where = 55 }
			
			command = { type = add_division which = "1st Militia Division" value = militia when = 8 }
			command = { type = add_division which = "2nd Militia Division" value = militia when = 8 }
			command = { type = add_division which = "3rd Militia Division" value = militia when = 8 }
			command = { type = add_division which = "4th Militia Division" value = militia when = 8 }
			command = { type = add_division which = "5th Militia Division" value = militia when = 8 }
			command = { type = add_division which = "6th Militia Division" value = militia when = 8 }
			command = { type = add_division which = "7th Militia Division" value = militia when = 8 }

	}
	
	action = {
			name = "The Ultra-Collaborationist Government request an immediate Axis intervention" 
			ai_chance = 10
			command = { type = trigger which = 355 }	
	}
}

#Germany abuses the chaos to invade France! - Case Anton
event = {
	id = 355
	random = no
	country = GER	
	style = 2
	picture = "Reichstag"
	
	name = "Case Anton" #Case Anton
    desc = "The disorder in France has become too big. We need to sweep clean the nation of anti-German sentiments."
	
	action = {
			name = "We will defeat France, again" 
			command = { type = end_non_aggression which = FRA where = GER } 
			command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
		    command = { type = war which = FRA }	
	}
}

#We have defeated France - Again!
event = {
	id = 356
	random = no
	country = GER	
	style = 2
	picture = "Reichstag"
	name = "We have defeated France, again" #We have defeated France - Again!
    desc = "We have taken Paris, and have brought stability trough the Wehrmacht"
	
    trigger = {
		war = { country = GER country = FRA }
		NOT = { 
			control = { province = 55 data = FRA } #Paris
		}			
		lost_national = { 
			country = FRA value = 50 
		}
	}
	
    date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 3
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
	
	action = {
			name = "Put the Pro-German elements in power, with our support" #Put the Pro-German elements in power, with our support
			ai_chance = 15
			command = { type = manpowerpool value = -10 }
			command = { type = supplies value = -1000 } 
	        command = { type = make_puppet which = FRA }
			command = { type = trigger which = 362 } #It's done encore un fois
            command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 5 } #New economic advantage		
	}
		action = {
			name = "Occupy the entire France" #We will destroy France for once and for all!
			ai_chance = 5
			command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
			command = { type = inherit which = FRA value = 0 }
			#command = { trigger = { alliance = { country = ITA country = GER } } type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 94 when = 0 } # Corsica - France 											
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 94 when = 0 } # Corsica - France 					
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 91 when = 0 } # Chambery - France 								
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 90 when = 0 } # Grenoble - France 								
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 87 when = 0 } # Nice - France 											
	}
	action = {
			name = "Delete France from map once for all" 
			ai_chance = 80
			command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
			command = { type = inherit which = FRA value = 0 }

			command = { trigger = { alliance = { country = ITA country = GER } } type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 94 when = 0 } # Corsica - France 	
			command = { trigger = { alliance = { country = ITA country = GER } } type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 91 when = 0 } # Chambery - France 	 
			command = { trigger = { alliance = { country = ITA country = GER } } type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 90 when = 0 } # Grenoble - France 			
			command = { trigger = { alliance = { country = ITA country = GER } } type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 87 when = 0 } # Nice - France 													

			command = { trigger = { alliance = { country = RSI country = GER } } type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 94 when = 0 } # Corsica - France 	 			
			command = { trigger = { alliance = { country = RSI country = GER } } type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 87 when = 0 } # Nice - France 			
			
			command = { trigger = { flag = ssAlive } type = independence which = U52 } #Burgundy

			command = { type = independence which = U39 } #Britanny
			command = { type = make_puppet which = U39 }
			command = { type = independence which = U60 } #Occitania
			command = { type = make_puppet which = U60 }

			#command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 88 when = 0 } # All the rest of France 
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 98 when = 0 } # All the rest of France 
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 64 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 97 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 63 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 95 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 100 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 99 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 54 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 66 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 65 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 72 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 56 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			#command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 55 when = 0 } # All the rest of France - Paris
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 60 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 48 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 58 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 47 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 62 when = 0 } # All the rest of France
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U47 value = 61 when = 0 } # All the rest of France

	}
}

#The Wermacht occupation of Paris
event = {
	id = 361
	random = no
	country = FRA
	style = 2
	picture = "aar_versailles"
	
	name = "The Wermacht occupation of Paris" 
    desc = "The Wehrmacht has occupy Paris, the  Ultra-Collaborationist Government is secured"
	
	action = {
		name = "The Government is safe" #We have no choice
		
		command = { type = dissent value = 20 }
					
        command = { type = secedearea which = GER value = "Paris" when = 1 }
		command = { type = capital which = 74 }
		
		command = { type = setflag which = GerVichy } 		
	}
}

#It is done! Encore une fois!
event = {
	id = 362
	random = no
	country = FRA
	style = 2
	picture = "aar_versailles"
	
	name = "We have been defeated ... encore un fois" 
    desc = "We have been defeated - again! The Germans demand us to return to our Armistice borders, and have placed our government under strict German control. If France had any chance to revive, it is lost now."
	
	action = {
		name = "We have no choice" #We have no choice
		
		command = { type = dissent value = 20 }
		
		command = { type = headofstate which = 5395 }
	    command = { type = headofgovernment which = 5381 }	
				
		command = { type = removecore which = 87 }		
		command = { type = removecore which = 91 }		
		command = { type = removecore which = 94 }				
		
        #command = { trigger = { alliance = { country = ITA country = GER } } type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 87 when = 0 } # Nice - France
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 94 when = 0 } # Corsica - France 					
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 91 when = 0 } # Chambery - France 								
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 90 when = 0 } # Grenoble - France 								
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 87 when = 0 } # Nice - France 											
        command = { trigger = { control = { province = 86 data = ITA } } type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 86 when = 1 } # Toulon - France
        command = { trigger = { control = { province = 90 data = ITA } } type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 90 when = 1 } # Grenoble - France 

        command = { trigger = { alliance = { country = SPA country = GER } } type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 80 when = 0 } # Perpignan
        command = { trigger = { alliance = { country = SPA country = GER }  } type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 83 when = 0 } # Pau
        command = { trigger = { control = { province = 84 data = SPA } } type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 84 when = 1 } # Agen
        command = { trigger = { control = { province = 67 data = SPA } } type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 67 when = 1 } # Mont-de-Marsan
        command = { trigger = { control = { province = 68 data = SPA } } type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 68 when = 1 } # Bordeaux		
		
	    command = { type = secedearea which = GER value = "Bourgogne_Champagne" when = 1 }
	    command = { type = secedearea which = GER value = "Lorraine_Alsace" when = 1 }
	    command = { type = secedearea which = GER value = "Pas de Calais" when = 1 }
	    command = { type = secedearea which = GER value = "Paris" when = 1 }
	    command = { type = secedearea which = GER value = "Normandy" when = 1 }
	    command = { type = secedearea which = GER value = "Brittany" when = 1 }
		command = { type = secedearea which = GER value = "Loire" when = 1 }
		command = { type = secedearea which = GER value = "Aquitaine" when = 1 }
		
	    command = { type = secederegion which = GER value = "Benelux" when = 1 }
	    command = { type = secederegion which = GER value = "Germany" when = 1 }
		
		command = { type = setflag which = GerVichy } 		
	}
}

#363 # An unexpected flight
event = {
	id = 363
	country = FRA
	save_date = yes
	random = no
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	trigger = {
		random = 10
		OR = {			
			flag = FreeVichy
		}
	}

	name = "An unexpected flight" #An unexpected flight
	desc = "The countryside of Marseilles was shocked by the sight of a military plane, cleary marked with Free French signs, landing in the fields. The passengers, retired soldiers, declare an end to enimity between the two French states and strive for approachement between the two sides. Those traitors have been welcomed by our own citizens and calls are arising to end this artificial division of France"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 7
	deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1964 }

	action = {
		trigger = { flag = FreeVichy }  
		ai_chance = 90
		name = "They are brothers,welcome them"
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
		
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -50 }	
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = -50 }	
		
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = 50 }	
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 50 }			
		command = { type = relation which = U01 value = 50 }	
		
		command = { type = setflag which = DeGaulleVichy } 
	}
	
	action = {
		trigger = { flag = FreeVichy }
		ai_chance = 10
		name = "They are invaders, arrest them"
		
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = 50 }	
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = 50 }	
		
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -50 }	
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -50 }			
		command = { type = relation which = U01 value = -50 }	
		
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
	}
	action = {
		trigger = { flag = GerVichy }
		ai_chance = 10
		name = "They are brothers,welcome them"
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
		
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -50 }	
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = -50 }	
		
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = 50 }	
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 50 }			
		command = { type = relation which = U01 value = 50 }	
		
		command = { type = setflag which = DeGaulleVichy } 
	}
	action = {
		trigger = { flag = GerVichy }
		ai_chance = 90
		name = "They are invaders, arrest them"
		
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = 50 }	
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = 50 }	
		
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -50 }	
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -50 }			
		command = { type = relation which = U01 value = -50 }	
		
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
	}
}

# 364 #Approachment with Free France
event = {
id = 364
	random = no
	save_date = yes
	country = FRA
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	trigger = {
		event = { id = 363 days = 30 }
		flag = DeGaulleVichy
	}
	
	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 3
	deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1964 }

	name = "Approachment with Free France"
    desc = "After last month's 'plane incident', we have the unique opportunity to meet with our enemies and brother, the French leadership under De Gaulle"
	
	action = {
		name = "Invite them over"
		ai_chance = 95
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -50 }	
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = -50 }	
		
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = 50 }	
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 50 }			
		command = { type = relation which = U01 value = 50 }			
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 } 			
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "Not now"
			ai_chance = 5
			command = { type = dissent value = 3 }			
			command = { type = clrflag which = DeGaulleVichy  }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = 50 }	
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = 50 }	
		
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -50 }	
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -50 }			
		command = { type = relation which = U01 value = -50 }				

}
}

# 367 #United States meddles in France!
event = {
id = 367
	random = no
	country = GER
	style = 2
	picture = "lend_lease"

	trigger = {
	event = { id = 366 days = 14 } #land lease on marshallplan.txt
    random = 50
	}
	
	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1955 }

	name = "United States meddles in France (Possible WW3 outcome)"
    desc = "We've discovered the French traitors have joined the Marshal Plan! As we speak, American material is flowing in France. If we do not act, we might as well see American troops in France, too"
	
	action = {
			name = "Impose a blockade"
			ai_chance = 90
			trigger = { NOT = { flag = usa_cw_isolation }}
			command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = -10 }
		    command = { type = relation which = USA value = -50 }
		    command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -50 }
			command = { type = trigger which = 368 }			
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "Let it happen"
			ai_chance = 10
			command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
			command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = -10 }
} 
}

# 368 #German tries to impose a blockade!
event = {
id = 368
	random = no
	country = USA
	style = 2 
	picture = "news_paper"             

	name = "German tries to impose a blockade"
    desc = "After Vichy France's participation in our Marshall Plan, the German government has decided to impose a blockade on France. However, Germany capablities of fullfilling such a task are very small"
	
	action = {
			name = "We'll send them anyway"
			ai_chance = 80
			command = { type = trigger which = 369 }			
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "We shouldn't anger Germany even more"
			ai_chance = 20
			command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
			command = { type = trigger which = 370 }
} 
} 

# 369 #United States ignores blockade!

	country = GER

	picture = "news_paper"             

	name = "United States ignores blockade"
    desc = "Despite our clear warnings to the United States and even imposing a blockade, American help is still being transported to France. We should give a more physical warning, perhaps."
	
	action = {
			name = "Shoot down a plane or two"
			ai_chance = 80
			command = { type = trigger which = 371 }			
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "Let it happen"
			ai_chance = 20
			command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
} 
} 

# 370 #German Blockade
event = {
id = 370
	random = no
	country = FRA
	style = 2 
	picture = "naval_blockade"             

	name = "German Blockade"
    desc = "Germany has succesfully blockades us, which means we won't be able to receive Marshall help anymore. Besides that very fact, we're restriced from the world market sans our direct neighbours."
	
	action = {
			name = "Damn"
		    command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
			
		    command = { type = construct which = ic where = 55 value = -5 }
            command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = -10 }
			
		    command = { type = embargo which = FRA where = ENG value = 3 }
		    command = { type = embargo which = FRA where = USA value = 3 }	
		    command = { type = embargo which = FRA where = U01 value = 3 }				
	}
} 

# 371 #Germany shot down American planes!

	random = no
	country = USA

	name = "Germany shot down American planes"
    desc = "Germany has shot down several United States airplanes, in response to our refusal to oust Vichy France from the Marshal Plan. It's essentially a declaration of war, but we're not warmongers like they are"
	
	action = {
			name = "Time to back down"
			ai_chance = 80
			command = { type = trigger which = 370 }
			command = { type = dissent value = 5 }		
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "This means WAR (WW3)" #WW3
			ai_chance = 20
		    command = { type = war which = GER }	
		    command = { type = alliance which = FRA }
} 
} 

# 372 #What to do with Vichy France
event = {
id = 372
	random = no
	country = U01
	style = 2
	save_date = yes    
	picture = "resistance"

	trigger = {
		event = { id = 363 days = 30 }
		NOT = { flag = DeGaulleVichy } 
		NOT = { flag = FreeVichy } 
	}
	
	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 3
	deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1964 }

	name = "Resistance in Metropolitan France"
    desc = "Events in French State lately have shown we'll never be able to have a peacefull solution to our division. We might want to apply different methods to bring down the French State government"
	
	action = {
			name = "The French Resistance is strong than ever"
			ai_chance = 90
			command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -50 }
			command = { type = relation which = GER value = -50 }
			
			command = { type = manpowerpool value = -10 }
			command = { type = supplies value = -1500 } 
			command = { type = dissent value = -5 } 
		    command = { type = setflag which = resistance }			
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "We can't do anything"
			ai_chance = 10
			command = { type = dissent value = 10 }			
	}
}

# 373 #French Resistance launch attacks!
event = {
	id = 373
	random = no
	country = FRA
	persistent = yes
	one_action = yes
	
	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1955 }
	
	trigger = {
		event = { id = 372 days = 30 }  
		random = 50
	}
	
	name = "The partisans activity is growing"
	desc = "A large number of France has taken it to the streets and danger the very existance of our government! If we do not put them down quick enough, we might not weather the storm."
	style = 2
	picture = "resistance"

	action = { trigger = { control = { province = 85 data = FRA } }
		ai_chance = 25
		name = "373A"
		command = {  type = revolt which = 85 }
        command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
	}
	action = { trigger = { control = { province = 89 data = FRA } }
		ai_chance = 25
		name = "Send the Armies in Marseille"
		command = { type = revolt which = 89 }
		command = { type = revolt which = 89 }
		command = { type = revolt which = 89 }
		command = { type = revolt which = 89 }
		command = { type = revolt which = 89 }
        command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
	}
	action = { trigger = { control = { province = 55 data = FRA } }
		ai_chance = 25
		name = "Send the Army"
		command = {  type = revolt which = 55 }
        command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
	}
	action = { trigger = { control = { province = 74 data = FRA } }
		ai_chance = 25
		name = "Send the Army"
		command = {  type = revolt which = 74 }
        command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
	}
	}
	
# 374 #Marseilles joins Free France?	
event = {
id = 374
	random = no
	country = FRA
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	trigger = {
		flag = resistance
		dissent = 10
		random = 35
		alliance = { country = U01 country = USA }
	}
	
	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 70
	deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1964 }

	name = "Unrest in South France (Possible WW3 outcome)"
    desc = "Marseilles is again a hotspot of partisan activity! The citizens of the city have revolted and declare unity with Free France. We can't let this happen"
	
	action = {
			name = "Send the Army"
			command = { type = manpowerpool value = -10 }
			
			command = { type = dissent value = 75 } 
			command = { type = trigger which = 375 }
			
		    command = {  type = revolt which = 89 }	
		    command = {  type = revolt which = 89 }	
		    command = {  type = revolt which = 89 }			
			command = {  type = revolt which = 76 }			
			command = {  type = revolt which = 71 }			
			command = {  type = revolt which = 92 }			
			command = {  type = revolt which = 83 }			
			
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U01 value = 89 when = 1 }
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U01 value = 86 when = 1 }
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U01 value = 87 when = 1 }
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U01 value = 89 when = 1 }
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U01 value = 82 when = 1 }
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U01 value = 79 when = 1 }
			command = { type = secedeprovince which = U01 value = 80 when = 1 }
			
	}
}

	country = U01

	picture = "news_paper"

    desc = "The citizens  of Marseilles have revolted against the government, but have been put down by the army. They declared unity with our government, and we might want to intervene when the illegal one is as unstable as it seems"
	
	action = {
			name = "Let's not start another World War"
			ai_chance = 20
			command = { type = dissent value = 10 } 		
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "We'll bring those traitors down"
			ai_chance = 80
			command = { type = dissent value = -3 } 
			#command = { type = leave_alliance when = 1 } #leave eventaully old alliance wars 
		    command = { type = war which = FRA }
			command = { type = trigger which = 376 }
	}
}

	action = {
			name = "This means WAR"
			ai_chance = 60
		    command = { type = alliance which = FRA }	
			command = { type = trigger which = 377 }
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "Let's them sort out"
			ai_chance = 40
			command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -50 }
			command = { type = trigger which = 377 }
	}
}

# 377 #War in France!
event = {
id = 377
	random = no
	country = USA
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	name = "War in France"
    desc = "After the population of Marseilles declared unity with the French government in Algiers a conflict has broken out between the two countries. Free France is nominally our ally, so we may act as we please"
	
	action = {
			name = "This means WAR (WW3)"
			ai_chance = 50
		    command = { type = alliance which = U01 }	
	}
	
	action = {
			name = "Let's them sort out"
			ai_chance = 50
			command = { type = relation which = U01 value = -100 }
    }	

}
#####################################
### France Gearing Up For Revenge ###
#####################################
event = {
	id = 378
	random = no
	save_date = yes   
	country = FRA

	decision = {
		flag = FreeVichy
		ispuppet = no
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		flag = FreeVichy 
		ispuppet = no
	}

	trigger = {
		flag = FreeVichy
		ispuppet = no
	}
   
	name = "Open up to the world"
	desc = "Vichy France has had some minor recognation in the initial years of the war. After the end of the war, it became completely isolated and was forced to participate in the plans Germany had for Europe. As a first step in our rearming, we should establish contacts with the Allies again and open up." 
	style = 2
	picture = "Rhineland"
	decision_picture = "decision_Rhineland"

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1949 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = "We come in peace"
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -50 }
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = -50 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 50 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = 50 }
		command = { type = relation which = U01 value = 50 }		
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
		command = { type = money value = -100 }
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 10 }
	}
}
	
event = {
	id = 379
	random = no
	save_date = yes   
	country = FRA

	decision = {
	event = { id = 378 days = 30 } 
	}

	decision_trigger = {
	event = { id = 378 days = 30 } 
	}

	trigger = {
	event = { id = 378 days = 30 } 
	}
   
	name = "Neglect the limitations on armor"
	desc = "Germany won the Second World War by sweeping it's tanks across Europe. After we were defeated back in 1940, Germany made sure we would never be able to posses those war winning vehicles. It's about time we neglect those limitations." 
	style = 2
	picture = "Rhineland"
	decision_picture = "decision_Rhineland"

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = "379A"
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -30 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 10 }
		
        command = { type = activate_unit_type which = motorized } 
        command = { type = activate_unit_type which = mechanized } 
        command = { type = activate_unit_type which = light_armor } 
		
	}
}
event = {
	id = 380
	random = no
	save_date = yes   
	country = FRA

	decision = {
	event = { id = 379 days = 30 } 
	}

	decision_trigger = {
	event = { id = 379 days = 30 } 
	}

	trigger = {
	event = { id = 379 days = 30 } 
	}
   
	name = "Conscription"
	desc = "After the war conscription in France was abolished and declared illegal by the German oppressors. Now that we're getting stronger each and every day, we might as well conscript our population again. Germany will surely not act too harsh" 
	style = 2
	picture = "Rhineland"
	decision_picture = "decision_Rhineland"

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1949 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = "Manpower"
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -30 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 10 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = professional_army value = 6 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = MOB3 } ai = no } type = resource which = supplies value = -100 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = MOB4 } ai = no } type = resource which = supplies value = -200 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = MOB5 } ai = no } type = resource which = supplies value = -200 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = MOB6 } ai = no } type = resource which = supplies value = -200 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = MOB2 } } type = manpowerpool value = 2 when = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = MOB3 } } type = manpowerpool value = 2.5 when = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = MOB4 } } type = manpowerpool value = 4 when = 1 }		
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = MOB5 } } type = manpowerpool value = 4.5 when = 1 }		
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = MOB6 } } type = manpowerpool value = 5 when = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = MOB2 } } type = local_setflag which = MOB2 }
		
		command = { type = local_setflag which = MOB3 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = MOB4 }		
		command = { type = local_setflag which = MOB5 }		
		command = { type = local_setflag which = MOB6 }
		
		command = { type = add_corps which = "1st Paris Army" value = land where = 55 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "1st Rifle Division" value = infantry when = 10 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "2nd Rifle Division" value = infantry when = 10 }
		command = { type = add_corps which = "1st Garcon Army" value = land where = 55 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "1st Militia Division" value = militia when = 8 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "2nd Militia Division" value = militia when = 8 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "3rd Militia Division" value = militia when = 8 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "4th Militia Division" value = militia when = 8 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "5th Militia Division" value = militia when = 8 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "6th Militia Division" value = militia when = 8 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "7th Militia Division" value = militia when = 8 }
		
	}
}

event = {
	id = 381
	random = no
	save_date = yes   
	country = FRA

	decision = {
	event = { id = 380 days = 30 } 
	}

	decision_trigger = {
	event = { id = 380 days = 30 } 
	}

	trigger = {
	event = { id = 380 days = 30 } 
	}
   
	name = "Economic Limitations"
	desc = "The most crippling of the punishments Germany gave us, were the economic ones. We were robbed of both factories and workforces and were treated as a mere tributary state." 
	style = 2
	picture = "Rhineland"
	decision_picture = "decision_Rhineland"

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = "Bon voyage"
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -30 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 10 }
		command = { type = 	end_puppet }
        command = { type = end_access which = GER }
		command = { type = end_access which = ITA }
	}
}

	id = 382
	random = no 
	country = FRA

	decision = {

	}

	decision_trigger = {
	event = { id = 381 days = 30 } 
	}

	trigger = {
	event = { id = 381 days = 30 } 
	}
   
	name = "Economic Limitations"
	desc = "The most crippling of the punishments Germany gave us, were the economic ones. We were robbed of both factories and workforces and were treated as a mere tributary state" 
	style = 2
	picture = "Rhineland"
	decision_picture = "decision_Rhineland"

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = "French resources for France"
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { type = money value = 500 }
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 10 }
        command = { type = end_trades which = FRA where = GER }
		command = { type = trigger which = 383 }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 383
	random = no
	country = FRA

	name = "The Armistice at Compiegne is void"
	desc = "We have succesfully thrown away the terms imposed upon us by the Armistice at Compi√®gne, therefor we can declare it nullified. Germany might act, but we're already too strong to be defeated a third time, right?" 
	style = 2
	picture = "Rhineland"

	action = {
		name = "W la France!"
		command = { type = trigger which = 384 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -200 }
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = -100 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 50 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = 50 }
		command = { type = relation which = U01 value = 50 }
		command = { type = setflag which = VichyStrong } 
		command = { type = end_non_aggression which = GER where = FRA }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 384
	random = no
	country = GER

	name = "France declares the Armistice at Compiegne void"
	desc = "Over the past few months, France has neglected most of the terms imposed by us after the Fall of France in the armistice at Compi√®gne. Now, they have officially declared the Armistice to be nullified. As our economy partly depends on the economic concessions done by France, we might want o act." 
	style = 2
	picture = "Rhineland"

	action = {
		name = "We have other priorities"
		ai_chance = 60
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = -10 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
	}
		action = {
		name = "This means WAR!"
		ai_chance = 40
	    command = { type = war which = FRA }
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = -10 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
	}
}

		ai_chance = 100

		command = { type = trigger which = 386 }
	}
}

	id = 387
	random = no
	country = FRA

	decision = {
		flag = DeGaulleVichy 
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		flag = DeGaulleVichy
		war = { country = GER  country = U01 }
	}

	trigger = {
		flag = DeGaulleVichy
		war = { country = GER  country = U01 }
	}
   
	name = "The French Alliance"
	desc = "Ever since the humilating defeat in 1940, we are preparing for that one day on which we can finally strike back and take revenge on the German warmongers for their behaviour, ever since the existance of a German state.;Ever since the humilating defeat in 1940, we are preparing for that one day on which we can finally strike back and take revenge on the German warmongers for their behaviour, ever since the existance of a German state" 
	style = 2
	picture = "Rhineland"
	decision_picture = "decision_Rhineland"

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 70
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

		name = "For our fathers!"
		command = { type = end_non_aggression which = FRA where = GER }
		command = { type = alliance which = U01 }
	    #command = { type = war which = GER }		
	}
}

	country = FRA

			exists = U01 # Free France
			}

	desc = "We have noticed who some agents are parachuted into metropolitan France."

	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	date = { day = 24 month = september year = 1949 }

	action = {
		name = "Damn !" 
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
		command = { type = intelligence which = us value = -5 }
		command = { type = intelligence which = them value = 5 }
	}
}

	country = FRA

		atwar = no
		random = 15
	}

	desc = "9300213desc"	
	style = 2	
	picture = "issue_currency"	

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1935 }	
	offset = 60	
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1935 }	


	action = {
		ai_chance = 100	
		name = 9300213a
		command = { type = money value = 200 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = dissent value = 2 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = yes } type = industrial_modifier which = total value = 5 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 5023 } # Laval
	
	}
	action = {
		ai_chance = 0	
		name = ACTION_NAME_REFUSE
		command = { }
	
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Motorways for the People
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 9001
	random = no
	country = FRA
	save_date = yes

	trigger = {
		atwar = no
		random = 75
	}

	name = "Motorways for the People"
	desc = "EVT_9001_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "motorway"

	date = { day = 23 month = january year = 1953 }
	offset = 13
	deathdate = { day = 12 month = march year = 1960 }

	action = {
		name = "Continue construction as planned"
		ai_chance = 99
		command = { type = local_setflag which = motorway }
		command = { type = money value = -500 }
	}
	action = {
		name = "Stop this nonsense, we don't have the funds"
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
	}
}
#########################################################################
#  Brest and Cherbourg motorways completed
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 9002
	random = no
	country = FRA
	save_date = yes

	trigger = {
		NOT = { atwar = yes }
		local_flag = motorway
		event = { id = 9001 days = 540 }
	}

	name = "Brest and Cherbourg motorways completed"
	desc = "After over a year of hard work and immense efforts invested, the motorways connecting Paris with Cherbourg and Brest are finally completed."
	style = 0
	picture = "motorway"

	date = { day = 23 month = january year = 1957 }
	offset = 17
	deathdate = { day = 12 month = march year = 1960 }

	action = {
		name = "Excellent"
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 48 value = 10 }
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 44 value = 10 }
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 43 value = 20 }

		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 42 value = 10 }
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 38 value = 10 }
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 39 value = 10 }
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 37 value = 10 }
	}
}

	picture = "motorway"

	date = { day = 23 month = july year = 1957 }
	offset = 17

		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 57 value = 10 }
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 69 value = 10 }

#########################################################################
#  Knights of the new age (by Ober)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 9014
	random = no
	country = FRA

	decision = {
		flag = UltraVichy
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		supplies = 120
	    money = 100
		atwar = no
	}

	trigger = {
		flag = UltraVichy
		atwar = no
	}

	name = "Knights of the New Age"
	desc = "Both propaganda and strong military power are important to totalitarist states - like France. While slowly preparing to confront democratic powers of Germany and United Kingdom, idea of creating modern equiped and fully indoctrinazed, devoted to system special military units. The idea quickly gained recognition of French military and political leaders (including Prime Minister Deloncle). First plans were adopted at the very end of 1936. "
	style = 0
	picture = "german_marginal_victory3"
	decision_picture = "decision_asienkorps"

	date = { day = 21 month = december year = 1951 }
	offset = 8
	deathdate = { day = 15 month = december year = 1957 }

	action = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = "Begin formation of new units!"
		command = { type = local_setflag which = FRA_knights }
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
		command = { type = money value = -50 } #Plans
		command = { type = supplies value = -100 } #Plans
	}
	action = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = "No, I won't be pissing of Germany again..."
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = FRA value = -1 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = 1 } #Yep, only 1
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 1 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Charlemagne armored division (by Ober)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 9015
	random = no
	country = FRA

	decision = {
		flag = UltraVichy
		local_flag = FRA_knights
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		supplies = 600
		metal = 1200
		oil = 300
		money = 50
	}

	trigger = {
		flag = UltraVichy
		local_flag = FRA_knights
		supplies = 500
		metal = 1000
		oil = 200
		money = 20
	}

	name = "Charlemagne armored division"
	desc = "One of the first unites to be trained according to the new plan was the Charlemagne armored division, named after the great Frankish emperor Charles the Great."
	style = 0
	picture = "german_marginal_victory3"
	decision_picture = "decision_asienkorps"

	date = { day = 17 month = march year = 1949 }
	offset = 10
	deathdate = { day = 15 month = december year = 1957 }

	action = {
		name = "Train the Charlemagne division"
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = FRA value = 1 }
		command = { type = supplies value = -600 } #Equipment
		command = { type = money value = -50 } #Training
		command = { type = oilpool value = -200 } #Fuel
		command = { type = metalpool value = -1000 }  #...tanks? Just to make things harder
		command = { type = event which = 9016 where = FRA when = 125 }
	}
}
#########################################################################
#  Charlemagne armored division formed (by Ober)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 9016
	random = no
	country = FRA

	name = "Charlemagne armored division formed"
	desc = "Four months of hard training, exhaustive work and propaganda education - finally, we are done. The first special unit, the Charlemagne Armored division was finally formed yesterday. Today the new unit will take part in a military parade in Reims!"
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	action = {
		name = "Ok"
		command = { type = add_corps which = "Division Cuirass√©e Charlemagne" value = land where = 99 } #Reims
		command = { type = add_division which = "Division Cuirass√©e Charlemagne" value = light_armor when = 0 }
	}
}
#########################################################################
#  Voiture du Peuple (by Ober)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 9030
	random = no
	country = FRA

	decision = {
		OR = {
			flag = UltraVichy
			flag = DarlanVichy
			flag = LavalVichy
		}
		domestic = { type = free_market value = 3 }
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		energy = 4000
		metal = 2000
		oil = 500
		supplies = 500
		money = 200
		NOT = { atwar = yes }
	}

	trigger = {
		government = fascist
		domestic = { type = free_market value = 3 }
		NOT = { atwar = yes }
	}

	name = "Voiture du Peuple"
	desc = "EVT_9030_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "car"
	decision_picture = "decision_invest_research"

	date = { day = 21 month = august year = 1951 }
	offset = 18
	deathdate = { day = 15 month = december year = 1958 }

	action = {
		ai_chance = 70
		name = "Launch production of VdPs in brand new factories!"
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 } #Unemployment goes down
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = -1 }

		command = { type = energypool value = -4500 } #Supplies for factories
		command = { type = metalpool value = -2500 } #Supplies for factories
		command = { type = supplies value = -500 } #Equipment for factories
		command = { type = oilpool value = -500 } #Fuel for factories
		command = { type = money value = -200 } #Salaries for workers

		command = { type = event which = 9031 where = FRA when = 160 }
	}
	action = {
		ai_chance = 25
		name = "Turn old and non-profitable enterprises into VdP factories!"
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 } #Unemployment goes down
		command = { type = energypool value = -2500 } #Supplies for factories
		command = { type = metalpool value = -1000 } #Supplies for factories
		command = { type = supplies value = -300 } #Equipment for factories
		command = { type = oilpool value = -300 } #Fuel for factories
		command = { type = money value = -100 } #Salaries for workers

		command = { type = event which = 9032 where = FRA when = 100 }
	}
	action = {
		ai_chance = 5
		name = "France is not going to be another Soviet Union"
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 } #No help from government
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = 1 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Vd factories are ready (by Ober)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 9031
	random = no
	country = FRA

	name = "VdP factories are ready"
	desc = "Finally it is done! The first line of VdP factories is ready! Common people are excited about the possibility of having their own car for a fair price. New factories will also help bring unemployment down in non-industrialized areas - so far so good! The only bad thing is that we'll have to wait a bit for serious profits, as for now it's up to us to subsidise the factories."
	style = 0
	picture = "car"

	action = {
		name = "Gonna get myself one soon!"
		command = { type = free_money value = -0.5 }
		command = { type = construct which = IC where = 76 value = 1 } #Tulle
		command = { type = construct which = IC where = 96 value = 1 } #Valence
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  VdP Research and Development Bureau (by Ober)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 9033
	random = no
	country = FRA

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			event = 9031
			event = 9032
		}
	}

	name = "VdP Research and Development Bureau"
	desc = "The VdP company is steadily improving its capacity for production of new vehicles. However, they need extensive investments in their research & development division if they're about to stay on the market. Investing in VdP research could pay off in the future, as some research will probably be applicable in military matters."
	style = 0
	picture = "car"

	date = { day = 21 month = january year = 1951 }
	offset = 18
	deathdate = { day = 15 month = december year = 1951 }

	action = {
		ai_chance = 90
		name = "Invest in VdP's research and development division"
		command = { type = money value = -300 }
		command = { type = waketeam which = 5037 } # VdP
	}
	action = {
		ai_chance = 10
		name = "This is unnecessary"
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 } # military-industrial complex unhappy
	}
}
#########################################################################
#  War reparations
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 758435
	random = no
	country = FRA
	style = 2
	picture = "french_flag"
	persistent = yes

	name = "Payment of the Compiegne Armistice reparations" 
	desc = "Despite massive protests from our citizens, the harsh austerity measures enacted in June 1940 have allowed us to amass sufficient cash to repay the remaining parts of the war reparations imposed upon us by the victorious Germans at the Treaty of Compiegne."

	date = { day = 27 month = march year = 1947 }
	offset = 300
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1955 }

	action = {
		name = "Take those damned money !"
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 8 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -10 }
		command = { type = money value = -700  }
		command = { type = trigger which = 758436 }
		command = { type = industrial_modifier which = total value = -1 }		
	}
}

event = {
	id = 758436
	random = no
	country = GER
	persistent = yes

	style = 2
	picture = "french_flag"
	
	name = "Payment of the Compiegne Armistice reparations" 
	desc = "Our government has decided that in order to restart our economy we need additional cash. Only available option how to amass sufficient capital to help our economy was to force French State to prematurely repay remaining reparations from the Treaty of Compiegne. "
	
	
	action = {
	name = "Excellent"
	command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
	command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -10 }
	command = { type = money value = 700  }
	command = { type = industrial_modifier which = total value = 1 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 7776043
	random = no
	country = FRA
	trigger = {
		exists = FRA
						
			}
		
	date = { day = 29 month = november year = 1948 }
	
	name = "French General Strike"
	desc = "After the government implemented a series of decrees aimed at improving the French economy at the expense of labor, the Confederation of Labor planned for a 24-hour general strike. To preempt the strike, the government militarized railway workers and requisitioned other services and threatened to deal harshly with any strikers. Only a few workers went on strike, but many labor leaders were arrested. The government used national defense as the rationale to take sterner action against organized labor."
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"
	action = {
		name = "We must preempt the strike."
		ai_chance = 100
				
		command = { type = dissent  value = 3 } 
		
																											
	}
}
